CustomField.formula: ( Date_Returned_to_PreSales__c - Date_Returned_to_Sales__c ) - ( FLOOR ( ( ( ( Date_Returned_to_PreSales__c ) - Date_Returned_to_PreSales__c ) / 7 ) ) * 2 ) + CASE(MOD ( Date_Returned_to_Sales__c - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7), 0,CASE( MOD (( Date_Returned_to_PreSales__c ) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7),0,1,2 ), 1,CASE( MOD (( Date_Returned_to_PreSales__c ) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7),0,2,1 ), IF(MOD( Date_Returned_to_Sales__c - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) - MOD(( Date_Returned_to_PreSales__c ) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) <= 0 ,0, IF(MOD(( Date_Returned_to_PreSales__c ) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) = 0,1,-2 ) ))
CustomField.label: No Of Days Returned to Sales
